conbody.p: Euca2ools 3.0.0 has the following new features.

row.entry: This release adds command line tools for CloudWatch, Auto Scaling, and Load Balancing.

Euca2ools now supports configuration files that make it easy to switch credentials and services at the command line. See "Working with Euca2ools Configuration Files" in the Euca2ools 3.0.0 Reference Guide for more information.
New API version for EC2 commands
All EC2 commands are now using API version 2013-02-01
Error output has been updated to make it more helpful and prescriptive.
This release offers full support for EC2's resource tags and filters using the --filter parameter.
